subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The colt impressed his trainer, Bob Baffert, with a sizzling workout early Sunday morning, but Saratoga Race Course has earned the nickname the Graveyard of Champions.
snippet: The colt impressed his trainer, Bob Baffert, with a sizzling workout early Sunday morning, but Saratoga Race Course has earned the nickname the Graveyard of Champions.
